casebody.data:
IN RE: Samuel SHUFORD No. 24P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina Samuel Shuford, For Shuford, Samuel

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 17th of January 2019 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Pender County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
